title: Crossroads
description: Dr. Hollis Monroe specializes in short-terms relationships, typically eight months or less. As an obstetrician dealing with high-risk pregnancies, she spends all her time and energy in caring for women at a nice, comfortable professional distance until she delivers their babies and can walk away. They're happy, she's satisfied, and no one gets hurt. The perfect relationship.Pregnant mother-to-be Annie Colfax is alone and barely making ends meetâ€”she didn't plan on starting a family by herself, but she's determined to succeed. All she had to do is survive.Neither woman wants a relationship, but fate brings them together at a crossroads that will change their lives forever.
author: Radclyffe
